  16. /* Based on public-domain code from Berkeley Yacc */

  18. #include <string.h>
  19. #include "defs.h"


  22. ‌bucket **symbol_table;
  23. ‌bucket *first_symbol;
  24. ‌bucket *last_symbol;


  27. int
  28. ‌hash(char *name)
  29. {
  30.     char *s;
  31.     int c, k;

  33.     assert(name && *name);
  34.     s = name;
  35.     k = *s;
  36.     while ((c = *++s))
  37.         k = (31*k + c) & (TABLE_SIZE - 1);

  39.     return (k);
  40. }


  43. bucket *
  44. ‌make_bucket(char *name)
  45. {
  46.     bucket *bp;

  48.     assert(name);
  49.     bp = (bucket *) MALLOC(sizeof(bucket));
  50.     if (bp == 0) no_space();
  51.     bp->link = 0;
  52.     bp->next = 0;
  53.     bp->name = MALLOC(strlen(name) + 1);
  54.     if (bp->name == 0) no_space();
  55.     bp->tag = 0;
  56.     bp->value = UNDEFINED;
  57.     bp->index = 0;
  58.     bp->prec = 0;
  59.     bp-> class = UNKNOWN;
  60.     bp->assoc = TOKEN;
  61.     bp->entry = 0;
  62.     bp->true_token = 0;

  64.     if (bp->name == 0) no_space();
  65.     strcpy(bp->name, name);

  67.     return (bp);
  68. }


  71. bucket *
  72. ‌lookup(char *name)
  73. {
  74.     bucket *bp, **bpp;

  76.     bpp = symbol_table + hash(name);
  77.     bp = *bpp;

  79.     while (bp)
  80.     {
  81.         if (strcmp(name, bp->name) == 0) return (bp);
  82.         bpp = &bp->link;
  83.         bp = *bpp;
  84.     }

  86.     *bpp = bp = make_bucket(name);
  87.     last_symbol->next = bp;
  88.     last_symbol = bp;

  90.     return (bp);
  91. }


  94. ‌void create_symbol_table(void)
  95. {
  96.     int i;
  97.     bucket *bp;

  99.     symbol_table = (bucket **) MALLOC(TABLE_SIZE*sizeof(bucket *));
  100.     if (symbol_table == 0) no_space();
  101.     for (i = 0; i < TABLE_SIZE; i++)
  102.         symbol_table[i] = 0;

  104.     bp = make_bucket("error");
  105.     bp->index = 1;
  106.     bp->class = TERM;

  108.     first_symbol = bp;
  109.     last_symbol = bp;
  110.     symbol_table[hash("error")] = bp;
  111. }


  114. ‌void free_symbol_table(void)
  115. {
  116.     FREE(symbol_table);
  117.     symbol_table = 0;
  118. }


  121. ‌void free_symbols(void)
  122. {
  123.     bucket *p, *q;

  125.     for (p = first_symbol; p; p = q)
  126.     {
  127.         q = p->next;
  128.         FREE(p);
  129.     }
  130. }
